query:
-- First, create the Charms category
INSERT INTO categories (name, slug, description, displayOrder, createdAt)
VALUES ('Charms', 'charms', 'Decorative charms for water bottles, bags, and accessories', 4, NOW());

-- Get the category ID (it should be the last inserted ID)
SET @charms_category_id = LAST_INSERT_ID();

-- Insert the water bottle charm product with 3 images
INSERT INTO products (
  name, 
  slug, 
  description, 
  price, 
  images, 
  categoryId, 
  stockQuantity, 
  isFeatured, 
  materials,
  createdAt, 
  updatedAt
)
VALUES (
  'Yellow Jade Bee Water Bottle Charm',
  'yellow-jade-bee-water-bottle-charm',
  'Adorable water bottle charm featuring natural yellow jade beads and a sparkly gold-tone bee charm with rhinestone wings. Perfect for personalizing your water bottle, bag, or backpack! The lobster clasp makes it easy to attach and remove.',
  10.00,
  JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('url', 'https://files.manuscdn.com/user_upload_by_module/session_file/310519663273273644/RWgIzaqlxFUPXCId.png', 'alt', 'Yellow Jade Bee Water Bottle Charm'),
    JSON_OBJECT('url', 'https://files.manuscdn.com/user_upload_by_module/session_file/310519663273273644/ZdiHHLQyEHcHdONu.png', 'alt', 'Bee Charm on Water Bottle'),
    JSON_OBJECT('url', 'https://files.manuscdn.com/user_upload_by_module/session_file/310519663273273644/SyNBedwTFgskJOkv.png', 'alt', 'Bee Charm Size Reference')
  ),
  @charms_category_id,
  10,
  1,
  JSON_ARRAY('Yellow Jade', 'Gold-tone Hardware', 'Rhinestones', 'Enamel'),
  NOW(),
  NOW()
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4XM1cDq5o889ZVr.root --database 79FEbyfoQZvYHzs6Bg5LHD --execute -- First, create the Charms category

VALUES ('Charms', 'charms', 'Decorative charms for water bottles, bags, and accessories', 4, NOW());

-- Get the category ID (it should be the last inserted ID)
